system.description: The true glory seekers, Knights are chivalrous to a point but have none of the @L[Class:Duelist]{Duelist's} respect for battles. Knights are the weapon masters, well-armored but relying on their swift, powerful attacks and powerful strength to destroy their enemy before they can counter attack. Knights are the real behemoths of the battlefield, leading troops into the fray and slaughtering all they can. If you are a Knight be looking for glory, looking for the next powerful weapon.

overview.base:
Rallying Cry only counts as a @L[Category:Mental effects]{mental effect} on your enemies and a @L[Category:Healing effects]{healing effect} on your allies. The @L[Core:Healing]{healing's} duration is @L[Category:Instant duration abilities]{instant}.

Note: People may choose to fail @L[Category:Feat abilities]{feat saves}.

results.fail: If you consider the targeted creature to be an ally of yours, they @L[Core:Healing]{heal}. If you consider the targeted creature to be an enemy, they become @L[Condition:Frightened]{frightened}.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the enemy target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. On a 4, this effect ends.

results.fail: You and the target are @L[Keyword:Vulnerable]{vulnerable} to each other.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base:
Note: A target moving due to Battle Charge can still provoke reactions like @L[Ability:Opportunity Attack]{Opportunity Attack}.
Note: This ability can trigger in the middle of @L[Ability:Move]{moving}. You could approach an enemy, trigger this ability, take an @L[Ability:Opportunity Attack]{Opportunity Attack} against them, keep moving towards them, and trigger this ability again.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

system.trigger: Moving at least 10 feet in a straight line towards the target and becoming adjacent to them.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Master Weapon Smith]{Master Weapon Smith} and @L[Ability:Runic Weapons]{Runic Weapons}.

You wave your hand over a weapon as arcane runes appear on its surface. While you are @L[Core:Presence]{attuned} to the targeted weapon, it is @L[Property:Runic]{runic} and effects that would render it @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed} cause it to be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} instead.
You gain @L[Ability:Triumphant Healing Surge]{Triumphant Healing Surge} and @L[Ability:Withstand]{Withstand}.
You are an @L[Keyword:Expertise]{expert} @L[Tradecraft:Blacksmith]{blacksmith}. In addition, you gain the ability to create @L[Property:Master Crafted]{Master Crafted} weapons.
You take the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage} as a @L[Damage:Hack]{body hack} instead. All @L[Category:Damage types]{damage types} still apply.
